s: With Herbatint I had never tried a shade under their 7 range. I had seen reviews of their darker shades suggested results pics being inaccurate and that was 100% true. This turned my medium red into black! Be very careful with this brand and save hair for a strand test!

s: It is far less toxic than most other brands on the market and the shades are very natural. ... An applicator bottle would have been appreciated. ... This came in a two package and one package was broken and leaking. I used the second one and the color was so wrong. I think it was damaged as well, but too late to return. I have chemical allergies so the no fragrance is wonderful and I have used this for a year. I will find a more reliable source. ... Herbatint ...
